data.title: Read how Apple, Amazon, Facebook and Google plan to defend themselves to Congress
data.text: With their big day before lawmakers just around the corner, previews of Google (well, Alphabet), Facebook, Amazon and Apple’s opening statements are now available on the House Judiciary Committee’s site. On Wednesday, the CEOs of each company will appear in an unusually executive-packed Congressional hearing focused on antitrust concerns over the business practices.

data.title: FB, AMZN, AAPL And GOOG Could Make For A Volatile Friday
data.text: With Alphabet/Google, Amazon, Apple and Facebook all reporting their June quarter results after the market closes on Thursday, Friday’s market action could be on the wild side.

data.title: Here’s what the CEOs of Apple, Amazon, Facebook and Alphabet will say at Wednesday’s antitrust hearing
data.text: The CEOs of four of the world’s largest and most influential tech companies are scheduled to testify Wednesday before a House antitrust panel, and they plan to emphasize how their products better American lives and jobs.

data.title: Report: Facebook's Instagram Attempting to Poach TikTok Users For New Video Service
data.text: TikTok's "creators" are apparently being offered financial incentives to jump to Instagram's Reels.

data.title: Facebook's Zuckerberg to tell Congress that the 'proudly American' social network has competition
data.text: Zuckerberg is scheduled to face US lawmakers on Wednesday in an antitrust hearing.

data.title: Zuckerberg's opening statement for Big Tech hearing: 'I believe it's important to maintain the core values of openness and fairness'
data.text: A portion of Facebook Inc.  Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg's opening statement for Wednesday's Big Tech hearing on antitrust issues is out.

data.title: Zuckerberg defends acquisitions of Instagram and WhatsApp in prepared remarks
data.text: Facebook's CEO Mark Zuckerberg's written testimony was released ahead of its testimony in front of Congress tomorrow. CNBC's Julia Boorstin reports.

data.title: Facebook CEO to defend company before Congress at Big Tech hearing
data.text: Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg will defend the social media powerhouse before a U.S. House of Representatives hearing Wednesday on the market power of major tech firms.

data.text:

data.title: Report: Facebook wants to poach top TikTok users
data.text: Social media giant Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) is waging an attack on rival platform TikTok by hitting it where it matters most: influential users, The Wall Street Journal reported.

data.title: Facebook Is Reportedly Offering Money To Lure Influencers From TikTok To Reels
data.text: Reels is widely viewed as Facebook's attempt to compete with TikTok, owned by Chinese-based parent company ByteDance, which crossed the 2 billion downloads mark in April.

data.title: What to expect from blockbuster Big Tech hearing with CEOs of Amazon, Apple, Google and Facebook
data.text: For the first two decades of Amazon’s life, its founding CEO, Jeff Bezos, did his best to stay out of political battles, trying to stay off the radar of regulators in the early tradition of Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates.

data.title: Former FTC Commissioner on tech antitrust: The standard is, are consumers better off
data.text: Mozelle Thompson, former FTC Commissioner and Facebook advisory board member, joins 'Squawk Alley' to discuss which tech company he thinks is most vulnerable at Wednesday's Big Tech hearing and what legislators may looking to hear from the CEOs.

data.title: Facebook boycott grows as US campaigners urge European firms to act
data.text: Growing number of companies withdraw advertising over social network’s failure to deal with hate and misinformation

data.title: What to expect from Facebook, Apple, Amazon and Alphabet CEOs during upcoming antitrust hearing
data.text: The CEOs of Amazon, Apple, Alphabet and Facebook will testify before lawmakers on Wednesday about their companies' growing power and dominance.

data.title: Tech Stocks' Jul 29 Earnings Roster: FB, PYPL, TYL & More
data.text: Here we take a sneak peek into the upcoming earnings releases of tech stocks scheduled for Jul 29.

data.title: What to expect from big tech hearing on capitol hill tomorrow
data.text: Deutsche Bank Global Head of Tech Strategy Apjit Walia on big tech CEOs meeting to testify on Capitol Hill and the importance of the industry on the market.

data.title: Why Earnings Season Could Be Great for Facebook (FB)
data.text: Facebook (FB) is seeing favorable earnings estimate revision activity and has a positive Zacks Earnings ESP heading into earnings season.

data.title: Facebook Takes Down Viral Video Making False Claim That ‘Hydroxychloroquine Cures Covid’
data.text: Facebook, YouTube and Twitter have deleted a viral video titled "America's Frontline Doctors" that attracted millions of views with dubious claims about hydroxychloroquine.

data.title: Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google Prepare for Their ‘Big Tobacco Moment’
data.text: The tech C.E.O.s will appear together at a congressional hearing on Wednesday to argue that their companies do not stifle competition.
